entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
